        java.sql.SQLException - when database connection close() fails

      • updateRecordFromAppInDatabase

        public boolean updateRecordFromAppInDatabase(DeviceDatabaseRecord record)
                                      throws java.sql.SQLException,
                                             java.lang.IllegalArgumentException,
                                             java.lang.Exception
        Updates the record in the database if it is existing.
        Parameters:
        record - the record
        Returns:
        true, if successful, false if not existing
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - the sQL exception
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - the illegal argument exception
        java.lang.Exception - the exception

      • getRecordsByPartialStringAndColumn

        public java.util.List<DeviceDatabaseRecord> getRecordsByPartialStringAndColumn(java.lang.String search_input,
                                                                      java.lang.String search_option)
                                                                        throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Searches and returns all records that match the search string in the specified column.
        Parameters:
        search_input - the string fragment that is searched for
        search_option - the column of the DB-table where the method should search in
        Returns:
        a list of the type DeviceDatabaseRecord containing all records, an empty list when nothing was found
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - the illegal argument exception
